articles.title: TCS set to win $2-billion deal from BSNL for 4G and 5G roll-out - Business Standard

articles.title: Bank launches special FD scheme that offers 8.4% to senior citizens | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Since May this year, the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has hiked the repo rates 4 times. which in turn has made fixed deposits (FDs) interest rates more attractive
